answers.answer: i actually took mine today and I am waiting for the results. I was wondering if after you drank the drink the rest of the day you felt like you were going to throw up? I am scared that I might have it.
I took mine today too, I got sick there and spent the rest of the day sick so I hope its normal.
I took mine tuesday.  No results yet.  Didn't make me sick but I was burping the rest of the day

Completely normal mommas. I am a regular type 2 diabetic. This is my 5th pregnancy. First as a diabetic. Every time I had to drink the "drink" I got sick and was sick all day.  Actually passed out the last time. Drink extra water to flush out ur body.  Having GD takes some of the "fun" so to speak outta your prego diet. Gotta watch ur cravings. But it is usually easily managed by modifying ur diet and making sure to walk daily. Any specific questions feel free to ask..I'll tell what I know from my personal experiences with GD and regular diabetes. Good luck to u all
I.took mine yday and I am hoping that I don't get a call from my hospital...

question: so I took the sugar test yesterday and today I got the results and it came out that iam diabetic is anyone in the same boat?? I mean I really don't know what to do...
title: diabetic during pregnancy
